MAN.TITLE: bessely
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Bessel functions of the second kind (Y sub alpha).

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : real vector with non negative entries
: real vector with non negative entries regularly spaced with increment equal to one alpha=alpha0+(n1:n2)

DESCRIPTION.P: bessely(alpha,x) computes Bessel functions of the second kind (Y sub alpha), for real, non-negative order alpha and argument x. alpha and x may be vectors. The output is m-by-n with m = size(x,'*'), n = size(alpha,'*') whose (i,j) entry is bessely(alpha(j),x(i)).
Y_alpha and J_alpha (see besselj) Bessel functions are 2 independant solutions of the Bessel 's differential equation :
DESCRIPTION.VERBATIM: 2 2 2 x y" + x y' + (x - alpha ) y = 0 , alpha >= 0
